title: New: Dee Dee Mayo – It's Not Hard
body: Minneapolis based artist **Dee Dee Mayo** fills the air with some hazy, tropical and beach flavored surf sounds that will have you on your feet in a second.  _It’s Not Hard_ is a hard to resist ’60s jangly pop maelstrom with a dark vocal twist and a soothing nostalgic ease, a perfect taster for his debut release that’s about to follow. **Dee Dee Mayo Sweats It Out  tape** will drop on 19th August via [**No Problem Records**](http://noproblemrecs.com/). It's Not Hard by Dee Dee Mayo
